column5: Gotta love vertical jigging. managed to get out last night near Walpole Island on the St Clair River in 28-30ft. 2 of us were able to connect with 8 nice 1.5 - 2.5 lb Walleye, cooked the smallest for lunch today, mmmmmmm was it tasty      heading out again tomorrow, cant wait.
well done dave mc !!!! i was hoping someone would do a st marys report,as i know they have been slamming some huge fish this spring down there !!! man they look tasty !!! cheers
